downloadDescription: This package will enable you to expedite Windows 10 and Windows 11 quality updates in Microsoft Intune.
detailsSection: This package will enable you to expedite Windows 10 and windows 11 quality updates in Microsoft Intune. Learn more about expediting updates here: https://docs.microsoft.com/mem/intune/protect/windows-10-expedite-updates
systemRequirementsSection: These tools are available in .zip format. To unzip the files, open File Explorer and find the zipped folder. To unzip the entire folder, right-click to select Extract All, and then follow the instructions. To unzip a single file or folder, double-click the zipped folder to open it. Then, drag or copy the item from the zipped folder to a new location.
installInstructionSection: Select the Download button and save the zip file to your local machine, then extract the files for your desired operating system and architecture.

relatedResourcesSection.title: expedite Windows 10 quality updates in Microsoft Intune
get the most out of expedited Windows quality updates - Microsoft Community Hub
